sentences.en: ...a huge round mass of smooth rock protruding from the water.
sentences.cn: …从水中突出来的一块光滑的圆形巨石。

sentences.en: " Her name Belle Watling,'said Uncle Peter, his lower lip beginning to protrude.
sentences.cn: " 她叫贝尔-沃特琳, " 彼得大叔答道.

sentences.en: Anachronisms hang and protrude from every angle.
sentences.cn: 过时的东西挂起从各个角度伸出.

sentences.en: Buildings generally protrude above the ground and their roofs are generally composed of plane surfaces.
sentences.cn: 建物一般均高出地面且其屋顶是由平面所构成.

sentences.en: Curl upper lip up and raise and protrude upper lip.
sentences.cn: 上唇外翻,往上提,往外突出.
他的牙齿像犬牙一样向外凸出.

sentences.en: It made his great nose protrude more arrogantly.
sentences.cn: 这就使得他的大鼻子更加傲慢地翘起来.

sentences.en: Its material and exterior protrude out of the wall. This makes it look quite interesting.
sentences.cn: 其材料和外型凸出于墙面, 使得看上去颇有意味儿.

sentences.en: Jaws must be undershot . The incisors of the jaw should protrude over the upper incisors.
sentences.cn: 咬合必须是下颌突出式咬合, 就是说,下颌的门牙必须比上颌的门牙向前突出一些.

sentences.en: Moreover, eyes sometimes protrude, sometimes recede, sometimes are neither protruding nor receding.
sentences.cn: 而且, 眼睛有时候突出, 有时候后缩, 有时既不突出也不后缩.

sentences.en: Refer to a type of handle with the middle protrude.
sentences.cn: 葫芦柄,自然仿生学柄:横拍拍柄的一种类型,中间部位稍膨出.

sentences.en: To push out or protrude ( the lips ).
sentences.cn: 撅嘴伸出或撅起 ( 嘴唇 )

sentences.en: Wisps of straw protrude from the creature's sleeves and the collar of its tattered shirt.
sentences.cn: 一束束稻草从这种生物破烂衬衫的袖子和领子上伸出来.

words.tran_cn: 突出的；伸出的；招人注意的
